019    package com.smartitengineering.dao.common.cache.impl;
020    
021    import com.smartitengineering.dao.common.cache.CacheEventRegistrar;
022    import com.smartitengineering.dao.common.cache.ChangeEvent;
023    import com.smartitengineering.dao.common.cache.ChangeEvent.ChangeType;
024    import com.smartitengineering.dao.common.cache.ChangeListener;
025    import com.smartitengineering.domain.PersistentDTO;
026    import java.util.ArrayList;
027    import java.util.HashMap;
028    import java.util.HashSet;
029    import java.util.Iterator;
030    import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
031    import java.util.Map;
032    import java.util.Set;
033    
034    /**
035     *
036     * @author imyousuf
037     */
038    public class CacheEventRegistrarImpl
039        implements CacheEventRegistrar {
040    
041        private static final String ALL = "ALL";
042        private Map<Class, Set<ListenerTuple>> observers;
043        private Map<ChangeListener, Set<Class>> listeners;
044    
045        {
046            observers = new HashMap<Class, Set<ListenerTuple>>();
047            listeners = new HashMap<ChangeListener, Set<Class>>();
048        }
049        
050        public void addCacheEventListeners(Class<? extends PersistentDTO> observe,
051                                           ChangeType type,
052                                           ChangeListener... listeners)
053            throws IllegalArgumentException {
054            if (observe == null || listeners == null || listeners.length <= 0) {
055                throw new IllegalArgumentException();
056            }
057            for(ChangeListener listener : listeners) {
058                ListenerTuple tuple = new ListenerTuple();
059                tuple.setListener(listener);
060                tuple.setType(type);
061                Set<ListenerTuple> tuples;
062                if(!observers.containsKey(observe)) {
063                    tuples = new LinkedHashSet<ListenerTuple>();
064                    observers.put(observe, tuples);
065                }
066                else {
067                    tuples = observers.get(observe);
068                }
069                tuples.add(tuple);
070                Set<Class> classes;
071                if(!this.listeners.containsKey(listener)) {
072                    classes = new LinkedHashSet<Class>();
073                    this.listeners.put(listener, classes);
074                }
075                else {
076                    classes = this.listeners.get(listener);
077                }
078                classes.add(observe);
079            }
080        }
081    
082        public void removeListeners(ChangeListener... listeners) {
083            for(ChangeListener listener : listeners) {
084                if(this.listeners.containsKey(listener)) {
085                    Set<Class> classes = this.listeners.get(listener);
086                    if(classes != null && !classes.isEmpty()) {
087                        for(Class observe : classes) {
088                            Set<ListenerTuple> tuples = observers.get(observe);
089                            if(tuples != null && !tuples.isEmpty()) {
090                                Iterator<ListenerTuple> tupleIterator 
091                                    = new HashSet(tuples).iterator();
092                                while(tupleIterator.hasNext()) {
093                                    ListenerTuple tuple = tupleIterator.next();
094                                    if(tuple.getListener() != null && tuple.getListener() == listener) {
095                                        tuples.remove(tuple);
096                                    }
097                                }
098                            }
099                        }
100                    }
101                    this.listeners.remove(listener);
102                }
103            }
104        }
105    
106        public void fireEvent(ChangeEvent event) {
107            Class observe = event.getSource().getClass();
108            if(observers.containsKey(observe)) {
109                Set<ListenerTuple> tuples = observers.get(observe);
110                ArrayList<String> types = new ArrayList<String>();
111                types.add(ALL);
112                if(event.getChangeType() != null) {
113                    types.add(event.getChangeType().name());
114                }
115                if(tuples != null && !tuples.isEmpty()) {
116                    for(ListenerTuple tuple : tuples) {
117                        if(types.contains(tuple.getType())) {
118                            ChangeListener listener = tuple.getListener();
119                            if(listener != null) {
120                                listener.cacheChanged(event);
121                            }
122                        }
123                    }
124                }
125            }
126        }
127    
128        private class ListenerTuple {
129    
130            private ChangeListener listener;
131            private String type;
132    
133            public ChangeListener getListener() {
134                return listener;
135            }
136    
137            public void setListener(ChangeListener listener) {
138                this.listener = listener;
139            }
140    
141            public String getType() {
142                return type != null ? type : "";
143            }
144    
145            public void setType(ChangeType type) {
146                if (type != null) {
147                    this.type = type.name();
148                }
149                else {
150                    this.type = ALL;
151                }
152            }
153    
154            public void setType(String type) {
155                if (type != null) {
156                    this.type = type;
157                }
158            }
159    
160            @Override
161            public boolean equals(Object obj) {
162                if (obj == null) {
163                    return false;
164                }
165                if (getClass() != obj.getClass()) {
166                    return false;
167                }
168                final ListenerTuple other = (ListenerTuple) obj;
169                if (this.listener != other.listener &&
170                    (this.listener == null || !this.listener.equals(other.listener))) {
171                    return false;
172                }
173                if (!this.type.equals(other.type)) {
174                    return false;
175                }
176                return true;
177            }
178    
179            @Override
180            public int hashCode() {
181                int hash = 5;
182                hash =
183                    29 * hash +
184                    (this.listener != null ? this.listener.hashCode() : 0);
185                hash = 29 * hash + (this.type != null ? this.type.hashCode() : 0);
186                return hash;
187            }
188        }
189    }
